lead_paragraph: The bank also said 800 million euros in reorganization costs, including employee severance payments, contributed to its losses in the latest quarter.
snippet: The bank also said 800 million euros in reorganization costs, including employee severance payments, contributed to its losses in the latest quarter.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Announces $7 Billion Yearly Loss as Legal Issues Weigh on Results
headline.print_headline: Hurt by Legal Woes, Deutsche Bank Announces $7 Billion Yearly Loss

abstract: Deutsche Bank reports reports overall 2015 loss of 6.7 billion euros, or $7.3 billion, and fourth-quarter loss of 2.1 billion euros, compared with profit of 441 million euros in year-ago quarter; company's profit appears to be affected by high cost of legal run-ins with regulators.
